meanings.definition: To give out or deliver something to a number of people.
meanings.sent1: The teacher is distributing the worksheets to the students.
meanings.sent2: The postman is distributing letters to different houses.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel is distributing nuts to its friends in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The wind is distributing the seeds across the field.
meanings.sent5: The volunteer is distributing food to the homeless in the park.

meanings.definition: To spread or scatter something over an area.
meanings.sent1: The farmer is distributing seeds in the field.
meanings.sent2: The chef is distributing herbs evenly over the pizza.
meanings.sent3: The kids are distributing sand all over the playground.
meanings.sent4: The artist is distributing colors on the canvas with a brush.
meanings.sent5: The gardener is distributing fertilizer in the garden for healthy plants.

meanings.definition: The act of dividing or sharing something among a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The distributing of candies among the children was fair.
meanings.sent2: The distributing of tasks among the team members was efficient.
meanings.sent3: The distributing of prizes at the event brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The distributing of responsibilities in the family made everyone feel included.
meanings.sent5: The distributing of resources in the community helped everyone thrive.
